package org.mule.providers.legstar.test.jvmquery;
import org.mule.providers.legstar.transformers.AbstractHostToJavaEsbTransformer;
import com.legstar.xsdc.test.cases.jvmquery.JVMQueryReply;
import com.legstar.test.coxb.jvmquery.bind.JvmQueryReplyTransformers;

/**
 * LegStar/Mule Operation Host Byte Array to JVMQueryReply Transformer.
 * 
 * <code>HostByteArrayToJvmQueryReply</code> takes a byte array in host format
 * (EBCDIC) coming from a source Mainframe as input and turns it into
 * a JVMQueryReply object.
 * 
 * This class was generated by LegStar Mule Component generator.
 */
public class HostByteArrayToJvmQueryReply extends AbstractHostToJavaEsbTransformer {

    /**
     * Constructs the transformer. Source is a byte array and result will be
     * a JVMQueryReply object.
     */
    public HostByteArrayToJvmQueryReply() {
        super(new JvmQueryReplyTransformers());
        setReturnClass(JVMQueryReply.class);
    }


}
